# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0xA265B97B990EE76be43C0c1bD5731091f8F55144`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0xa1e45c433e6efece5d5473a0dc3d881b49cb2e47e8c006dace0bf883b1bb3277",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x3bdd7c28f28fafe66a67f6d9ceedff41612e6dc28154df9e5d673376ff5b4ee6",
        "r": "0x95e9741df645942ce4064adb2f22136fbc57ab694fd8aa16aeeaaff41de96ded",
        "v": 27
      }
    },
    "operator": {
      "hash": "0xa34a38ffec5ff6721de32c061524e736b12dc6c7a63511a1eebc29c83e19dc52",
      "signature": {

        "r": "0xdfe9be7b9063b7853cfe0f959bf893f4e046f16257b7570b2f296b6fe662848b",

### Step 2
#### Contract

*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```

```
